nodes.text: This male individual was a sultan in the Boz Pity system. The bounty hunter Sana Starros claimed that at some point before the Battle of Yavin, the smuggler Han Solo once pulled a scam on the sultan's daughter. By the time Starros caught up with Solo on a planet in the Monsua Nebula, she claimed that the sultan was still offering a moon in exchange for Solo's head.
